document_data.name: Haliator Mendara
document_data.mainbody: '''Haliator Mendara''' was a seasoned [[Red Plume]] of [[Hillsfar]] and the leader of Hillsfar's troops stationed in [[Y没lash]] around [[1367 DR]].
document_data.Description: Commander Mendara was a hardened and cruel man, middle-aged by [[1373 DR]]. He had a reputation of turning a bland eye on extortion and looting done by the Red Plumes of Hillsfar.
document_data.Activities: Haliator commanded roughly 240 Red Plumes arranged into 24 detachments. He condoned looting so long as his troops were the ones doing the looting.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1373}}, the [[Zhentarim]] became targeted by a mysterious [[Order of the Crippled Fang]]. The [[Shind Road]] that connected [[Hillsfar]] and Y没lash became swarmed by the [[fiends]] in service to the cult. Haliator's Red Plumes occasionally clashed with the roaming monsters, however, he showed little interest in aiding Zhent patrols and [[Merrik]] who was taken to Y没lash as a prisoner to be executer at a later date.
